snippet: Opposition fighters seized weapons and ammunition in what appeared to be part of a broader rebel offensive against Syrian military installations across the country.
abstract: Opposition fighters in Syria say that they have captured an air defense base in the eastern province of Deir el-Zour, taking at least 16 soldiers captive and seizing weapons and ammunition; attack appears to be part of a broader rebel offensive against Syrian military installations in several parts of the country.

byline.contributor: C. J. Chivers and Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and Rick Gladstone from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: Opposition fighters seized weapons and ammunition in what appeared to be part of a broader rebel offensive against Syrian military installations across the country.

headline.main: Syrian Rebels Say They Have Seized an Air Defense Post and Its Missiles
headline.print_headline: Syrian Rebels Say They Have Seized an Air Defense Post and Its Missiles
